description: This file is a Python source file implementing a repository class for managing security-related entities such as users, roles, and permissions using SQLAlchemy ORM with asynchronous support.

classes.name: SecurityRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing users, roles, permissions, and their associations within a tenant.

methods.name: Optional[User] get_user_by_email(self, email: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a User entity by email address.

methods.name: Optional[User] get_user_by_id(self, user_id: UUID)
methods.description: Retrieves a User entity by UUID.

methods.name: int count_users(self)
methods.description: Returns the total count of User entities.

methods.name: List[User] list_users(self, limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0)
User create_user( self, *, email: str, full_name: Optional[str], hashed_password: str, is_active: bool = True, is_superadmin: bool = False, )
methods.description: Creates a new User record with provided details.

methods.name: Optional[User] update_user( self, user_id: UUID, *, email: Optional[str] = None, full_name: Optional[str] = None, hashed_password: Optional[str] = None, is_active: Optional[bool] = None, is_superadmin: Optional[bool] = None, )
methods.description: Updates an existing User entity identified by UUID.

methods.name: None delete_user(self, user_id: UUID)
methods.description: Deletes a User entity by UUID.

methods.name: List[Role] list_roles_for_user(self, user_id: UUID)
methods.description: Retrieves roles associated with a specific user.

methods.name: List[Role] list_roles(self, limit: int = 100, offset: int = 0)
Role create_role(self, name: str, description: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Creates a new Role with a name and optional description.

methods.name: Permission ensure_permission(self, code: str, description: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Ensures a Permission exists with a given code, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: None assign_role_to_user(self, user_id: UUID, role_id: UUID)
methods.description: Associates a role with a user.

methods.name: None remove_role_from_user(self, user_id: UUID, role_id: UUID)
methods.description: Removes association of a role from a user.

methods.name: None add_permission_to_role(self, role_id: UUID, permission_id: UUID)
methods.description: Assigns a permission to a role.

methods.name: None remove_permission_from_role(self, role_id: UUID, permission_id: UUID)
methods.description: Removes a permission from a role.
